events_summary: St. Peter and St. Julie Billiart parishes have several January opportunities to connect, including a Walking With Moms in Need Epiphany volunteer gathering on Wednesday, January 7 (6:30–7:30 PM) at St. Julie’s. Fellowship continues with the Women’s Breakfast on Saturday, January 10 at 8:30 AM at St. Julie’s and the Men’s Breakfast on Saturday, January 17 at 8:20 AM at St. Peter’s. Youth events (RCY) are scheduled for January 15 and 22 at 7:30 PM, and St. Peter School hosts a New Family Open House on Sunday, January 25 from 10:00 AM–12:00 PM.
